summary.span: 從資料表的資料來源顯示單一資料錄的值，其中每個資料列都代表資料錄的欄位。

span.span: Displays the values of a single record from a data source in a table, where each data row represents a field of the record.

summary.span: 控制項可讓您編輯、刪除及插入記錄。

span.span: The control allows you to edit, delete, and insert records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [資料列欄位Row Fields](#row_fields) - [繫結至資料Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [安全性Security](#security) - [資料作業Data Operations](#data_operations) - [自訂使用者介面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項用來從資料來源的單一記錄顯示在資料表中，其中每個記錄的欄位會顯示在資料表資料列。The control is used to display a single record from a data source in a table, where each field of the record is displayed in a row of the table. 用於搭配主版詳細資料案例的控制項。It can be used in combination with a control for master-detail scenarios. 控制項支援下列功能：The control supports the following features: - 繫結至資料來源控制項，例如。Binding to data source controls, such as . - 內建的插入功能。Built-in inserting capabilities. - 內建更新和刪除功能。Built-in updating and deleting capabilities. - 內建的分頁功能。Built-in paging capabilities. - 以程式設計方式存取物件模型，以動態方式設定屬性、 處理事件，等等。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on. - 透過佈景主題和樣式的可自訂外觀。Customizable appearance through themes and styles. ## 資料列欄位Row Fields 在每個資料列藉由宣告欄位控制項建立控制項。Each data row in the control is created by declaring a field control. 不同的資料列欄位型別決定控制項中的資料列的行為。Different row field types determine the behavior of the rows in the control. 欄位控制項衍生自。Field controls derive from . 下表列出可用的不同的資料列欄位型別。The following table lists the different row field types that can be used. |資料行欄位類型Column field type|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||以文字中顯示資料來源中欄位的值。Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| ||顯示命令按鈕在控制項。Displays a command button in the control. 這可讓您顯示具有自訂按鈕控制項，例如新增或移除按鈕的資料列。This allows you to display a row with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| ||顯示在核取方塊控制項。Displays a check box in the control. 這個資料列的欄位型別通常用於顯示具有布林值的欄位。This row field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||顯示內建命令按鈕來執行編輯、 插入或刪除作業控制項。Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in the control.| ||資料來源中的欄位的值顯示為超連結。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 這個資料列的欄位型別可讓您將第二個欄位繫結至超連結的 URL。This row field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||顯示在影像控制項。Displays an image in the control.| ||顯示使用者定義的內容中的資料列的控制項根據指定的範本。Displays user-defined content for a row in the control according to a specified template. 這個資料列的欄位型別可讓您建立自訂的資料列的欄位。This row field type allows you to create a custom row field.| 根據預設，屬性設定為`true`，這會自動產生資料來源繫結的資料列欄位物件，可繫結類型的每個欄位。By default, the property is set to `true`, which automatically generates a bound row field object for each field of a bindable type in the data source. 有效的可繫結類型為， ， ， ，與基本型別的集合。Valid bindable types are , , , , and the set of primitive types. 每個欄位然後顯示資料列中為文字，每個欄位出現在資料來源中的順序。Each field is then displayed in a row as text, in the order in which each field appears in the data source. 自動產生資料列提供快速簡便的方式來顯示記錄中的每個欄位。Automatically generating the rows provides a quick and easy way to display every field in the record. 不過，要使用的控制項的進階的功能，您必須明確宣告中包含的資料列欄位控制項。However, to make use of the control's advanced capabilities you must explicitly declare the row fields to include in the control. 若要宣告的資料列的欄位，請先設定屬性`false`。To declare the row fields, first set the property to `false`. 接下來，加入 開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。Next, add opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 最後，列出您想要包含在開頭和結尾之間的資料列欄位``標記。Finally, list the row fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `` tags. 指定的資料列欄位都會加入至集合的順序列出。The row fields specified are added to the collection in the order listed. 集合可讓您以程式設計方式管理中的資料列欄位控制項。The collection allows you to programmatically manage the row fields in the control. > [!NOTE] > 自動產生的資料列欄位不會加入至集合。Automatically generated row fields are not added to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 明確宣告的資料列欄位可顯示與自動產生的資料列欄位一起使用。Explicitly declared row fields can be displayed in combination with automatically generated row fields. 同時使用時，明確宣告的資料列會首先呈現欄位，後面接著會自動產生的資料列欄位。When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields. ## 繫結至資料Binding to Data 控制項可以繫結至資料來源控制項 (例如控制項或控制項) 或任何資料來源集合中實作介面，例如， ， ，或其他集合型別。The control can be bound to a data source control (such as the control or control) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types. 使用下列方法的其中一個繫結控制項至適當的資料來源類型：Use one of the following methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 若要繫結至資料來源控制項，將屬性控制權傳輸至資料來源控制項的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 這是慣用的方法繫結至資料。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 繫結至資料來源實作介面，以程式設計方式設定屬性控制權傳輸至資料來源，然後呼叫方法。To bind to a data source that implements the interface, programmatically set the property of the control to the data source and then call the method. 如需資料繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on data binding, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 安全性Security 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## 資料作業Data Operations 控制項提供內建功能，允許使用者更新、 刪除、 插入和控制項中的項目頁面上。The control provides built-in capabilities that allow the user to update, delete, insert, and page through items in the control. 當控制項所繫結至資料來源控制項，控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動更新、 刪除、 插入和分頁功能。When the control is bound to a data source control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating, deleting, inserting, and paging functionality. > [!NOTE] > 控制項可以為 update、 delete、 insert 和分頁作業與其他類型的資料來源提供的支援; 不過，您必須提供適當的事件處理常式中的這些作業的實作。The control can provide support for update, delete, insert, and paging operations with other types of data sources; however, you must provide the implementation for these operations in an appropriate event handler. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱、和。For more information, see , , and . 控制項可自動將新增包含編輯、 刪除或新增按鈕所設定的資料列欄位， ，或屬性`true`分別。The control can automatically add a row field with an Edit, Delete, or New button by setting the , , or properties to `true`, respectively. 不同於 [刪除] 按鈕 （這會立即刪除選取的記錄），按一下 [編輯] 或 [新增] 按鈕時，編輯，或分別插入模式中，控制項便會進入。Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the selected record immediately), when the Edit or New button is clicked, the control goes into edit or insert mode, respectively. 在編輯模式中，編輯 按鈕會取代的更新 和 取消 按鈕。In edit mode, the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button. 輸入適用於該欄位的資料類型的控制項 (例如或控制項) 會顯示與使用者修改欄位的值。Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a or a control) are displayed with a field's value for the user to modify. 按一下 更新 按鈕更新資料來源中的記錄，而按一下取消 5d; 按鈕會放棄所有變更。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes. 同樣地，在插入模式下，新增 按鈕會取代 Insert 和 取消 5d; 按鈕，並讓使用者輸入新記錄的值會顯示空白的輸入的控制項。Likewise, in insert mode, the New button is replaced with an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for the user to enter the values for the new record. > [!NOTE] > 您也可以手動定義 update、 delete 和 insert 命令按鈕在， ，或資料列欄位。You can also manually define the update, delete, and insert command buttons in a , , or row field. 控制項辨認按鈕與屬性設定為 「 編輯 」、 「 更新 」、 「 刪除 」、 「 新增 」、 「 插入 」，或 [取消]; 不過，您仍然必須提供功能自己。The control recognizes buttons with the property set to "Edit", "Update", "Delete", "New", "Insert", or "Cancel"; however, you still must provide the functionality yourself. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱、和。For more information, see , , and . 控制項提供分頁功能，可讓使用者巡覽至其他資料來源中的記錄。The control provides a paging feature, which allows the user to navigate to other records in the data source. 啟用時，頁面導覽控制項會顯示在頁面巡覽區列。When enabled, page navigation controls are displayed in a pager row. 若要啟用分頁，屬性`true`。To enable paging, set the property to `true`. 您可以使用自訂頁面巡覽區列和屬性。The pager row can be customized using the and properties. ## 自訂使用者介面Customizing the User Interface 您可以自訂的外觀藉由設定控制項的不同部分的樣式屬性的控制項。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the style properties for different parts of the control. 下表列出您可以設定的樣式屬性。The following table lists the style properties that you can set. |樣式屬性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||中的交替資料列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the alternating data rows in the control. 當設定這個屬性時，資料列會顯示在群組列，交替設定和設定。When this property is set, the data rows are displayed in bands, alternating between the settings and the settings.| ||包含內建的命令按鈕的資料列樣式設定。The style settings for the row that contains the built-in command buttons.| ||樣式設定為資料列時控制項處於編輯模式。The style settings for the data rows when the control is in edit mode.| ||會顯示在空白資料列的樣式設定控制當資料來源不包含任何記錄。The style settings for the empty data row that are displayed in the control when the data source does not contain any records.| ||頁尾資料列樣式設定。The style settings for the footer row.| ||標頭資料列樣式設定。The style settings for the header row.| ||樣式設定為資料列時控制項處於插入模式。The style settings for the data rows when the control is in insert mode.| ||頁面巡覽區列樣式設定。The style settings for the pager row.| ||中的資料列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the data rows in the control. 當屬性也設定時，資料列會顯示交替設定和設定。When the property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the settings and the settings.| ||標頭資料行樣式設定。The style settings for the header column.| ## 事件Events 控制項提供數個事件，您可以程式設計的。The control provides several events that you can program against. 這可讓您在事件發生時執行自訂的常式。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出支援的事件控制項。The following table lists the events supported by the control. 控制項也會繼承這些事件及其基底類別： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The control also inherits these events from its base classes: , , , , , , and . |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||按一下 控制項中的按鈕時會發生這個事件。Occurs when a button is clicked in the control.| ||在所有發生物件都會建立控制項。Occurs after all objects are created in the control. 此事件通常用於顯示之前修改記錄的值。This event is often used to modify the values of a record before it is displayed.| ||發生於按一下的 [刪除] 按鈕，但之後控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來檢查刪除作業的結果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||發生於按一下的 [刪除] 按鈕前,控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來取消刪除作業。This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.| ||發生於按一下的 [插入] 按鈕，但之後控制項才會插入記錄。Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用於檢查插入作業的結果。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||發生於按一下的 [插入] 按鈕前,控制項才會插入記錄。Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用來取消插入作業。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.| ||發生於按一下的更新 按鈕，但之後控制項更新資料列。Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but after the control updates the row. 若要檢查更新作業的結果通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||發生於按一下的更新 按鈕前,控制更新的記錄。Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常用來取消更新作業。This event is often used to cancel the update operation.| ||之後，就會發生控制項變更 （編輯、 插入或唯讀模式） 的模式。Occurs after the control changes modes (edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常用來執行工作時控制項變更模式。This event is often used to perform a task when the control changes modes.| ||發生於之前控制項變更 （編輯、 插入或唯讀模式） 的模式。Occurs before the control changes modes (edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常用來取消模式變更。This event is often used to cancel a mode change.| ||按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 當您需要執行的工作之後使用者巡覽至不同的記錄控制項中, 時，通常使用這個事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 控制項處理分頁作業之前。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用於取消的分頁作業。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以使用控制項結合簡單的主版詳細資料案例的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use to use a control in combination with a control for a simple master-detail scenario. 它會顯示選取之項目的詳細資料控制項。It displays the details of an item selected in the control. span.span: to enable the paging feature; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項具有內建的分頁功能，可讓使用者瀏覽至不同資料來源中的記錄。The control has built-in paging capabilities, which allow a user to navigate to a different record in the data source. 控制項可以執行使用者介面 (UI) 和資料來源分頁。The control can perform both user interface (UI) and data source paging. UI 分頁功能可以搭配任何支援的資料來源物件介面。The UI paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the interface. 每個分頁作業，控制查詢的整個資料收集的資料來源，並選取要顯示的資料列基本上並捨棄其餘的資料。For each paging operation, the control queries the data source for the entire data collection and selects the row to display, essentially discarding the remaining data. 如果資料來源實作和屬性會傳回`true`、控制項將會使用資料來源分頁，而不是 UI 分頁。If a data source implements and the property returns `true`, the control will use data source paging instead of UI paging. 在此情況下，控制項將會查詢每個分頁作業所需的資料列。In this case, the control will query for only the row needed for each paging operation. 因此，資料來源分頁會更有效率 UI 分頁。Thus, data source paging is more efficient than UI paging. 只有物件支援未經修改的資料來源分頁。Only the object supports data source paging without modification. 若要啟用分頁功能，將屬性`true`。To enable the paging feature, set the property to `true`. 您可以使用，以判斷基礎資料來源中的項目總數屬性。You can determine the total number of items in the underlying data source by using the property. 若要判斷目前所顯示的項目索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of the currently displayed item, use the property. 啟用分頁時，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在控制項。When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽區列包含頁面導覽控制項，而且可以顯示在頂端、 底端，或最上層及控制項的底部。The pager row contains the page navigation controls and can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 頁面巡覽區列有兩個內建的頁面巡覽，顯示模式： 編號頁面和上一頁和下一頁連結 （預設值）。The pager row has two built-in pager display modes: numbered pages and next and previous page links (default). 編號的頁面模式會顯示個別頁面，讓使用者巡覽至特定頁面的連結。The numbered pages mode displays links for the individual pages, allowing the user to navigate to a specific page. 下一頁和上一頁連結模式顯示控制項，可讓使用者巡覽至下一頁或上一頁。The next and previous links mode displays controls that allow the user to navigate to the next or the previous page. > [!NOTE] > 控制項自動隱藏頁面巡覽列，當資料來源包含兩個以上的記錄。The control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains fewer than two records. 您可以使用來控制的設定 （例如頁面巡覽區顯示模式，在時間和頁面巡覽區控制項的文字標籤顯示的頁面連結數目） 的頁面巡覽列屬性。You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text label) by using the property. 若要控制項目的出現的頁面巡覽列 （包括其背景色彩、 字型色彩和位置），使用屬性。To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color, font color, and position), use the property. 控制項也可讓您定義的頁面巡覽列的自訂範本。The control also allows you to define a custom template for the pager row. 如需有關如何建立自訂的頁面巡覽區列範本的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on creating a custom pager row template, see . 控制項提供數個事件，您可以使用分頁發生時執行自訂動作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs. 下表列出可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 當您需要執行的工作之後使用者巡覽至不同的記錄控制項中, 時，通常使用這個事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 控制項處理分頁作業之前。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用於取消的分頁作業。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| 值儲存檢視狀態中。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來啟用分頁功能控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the paging capabilities of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAllowPaging/CS/detailsviewallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAllowPaging/VB/detailsviewallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得 物件的參考，這個物件可讓您設定 控制項中替代資料列的外觀。

span.span: A reference to the that represents the style of alternating data rows in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制資料中交替資料列的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of alternating data rows in a control. 當設定這個屬性時，資料列會顯示交替設定和設定。When this property is set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the settings and the settings. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `AlternatingRowStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `AlternatingRowStyle-ForeColor`). 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `AlternatingRowStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `AlternatingRowStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定替代資料列中的字型和樣式設定控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the font and style settings for the alternating data rows in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewRowStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewRowStyle/CS/detailsviewrowstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewRowStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewRowStyle/VB/detailsviewrowstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所繫結的物件，繼承自和屬性會傳回`true`、控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動正在刪除功能。When a control is bound to an object that inherits from and the property returns `true`, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic deleting functionality. > [!NOTE] > 如要刪除的資料、 物件基礎屬性物件必須使用刪除查詢陳述式來設定。For a object to delete data, the property of the underlying object must be set with a delete query statement. 當屬性設定為`true`、資料列與 [刪除] 按鈕的欄位會自動顯示在控制項。When the property is set to `true`, a row field with a Delete button is automatically displayed in the control. 按一下 [刪除] 按鈕會永久地從資料來源中移除該記錄。Clicking the Delete button permanently removes that record from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 您也必須設定自動刪除功能運作的屬性。You must also set the property for the automatic deletion feature to work. 控制項提供數個事件，可用來刪除記錄時執行自訂動作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a record is deleted. 下表列出可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||發生於按一下的 [刪除] 按鈕，但之後控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when the Delete button is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來檢查刪除作業的結果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||發生於按一下的 [刪除] 按鈕前,控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when the Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來取消刪除作業。This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.| 值儲存檢視狀態中。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示內建的控制項，刪除目前的記錄。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the built-in control to delete the current record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewAutoGenerateDeleteButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateDeleteButton/CS/detailsviewautogeneratedeletebuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewAutoGenerateDeleteButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateDeleteButton/VB/detailsviewautogeneratedeletebuttonvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當支援更新的資料來源控制項繫結至控制項，控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動更新功能。When a data source control that supports updating is bound to a control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality. > [!NOTE] > 資料來源控制項來更新資料，其屬性必須使用 update 查詢陳述式來設定。For a data source control to update data, its property must be set with an update query statement. 當屬性設定為`true`、資料列與 [編輯] 按鈕的欄位會自動顯示在控制項。When the property is set to `true`, a row field with an Edit button is automatically displayed in the control. 按一下 [編輯] 按鈕將控制項處於編輯模式。Clicking the Edit button puts that control in edit mode. 處於編輯模式時，每個繫結的欄位不是唯讀的控制項中顯示適當的輸入的控制項，例如控制欄位的資料類型。When in edit mode, each bound field in the control that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a control, for the field's data type. 這可讓使用者修改欄位的值。This allows the user to modify the field's value. 按一下時，編輯 按鈕也會取代的更新 按鈕和 取消 按鈕。When clicked, the Edit button is also replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button. 按一下 [更新] 按鈕的任何值變更來更新資料來源中的記錄並傳回所指定模式的控制項屬性。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source with any value changes and returns the control to the mode specified by the property. 按一下取消 5d; 按鈕會放棄所有值變更，並傳回控制項的預設模式。Clicking the Cancel button abandons any value changes and returns the control to the default mode. > [!NOTE] > 要放置以程式設計方式控制處於編輯模式，請使用方法。To put a control in edit mode programmatically, use the method. 當屬性也會設為`true`、控制會自動確定中指定的欄位屬性是唯讀狀態。When the property is also set to `true`, the control automatically ensures that the field or fields specified in the property are read-only. > [!NOTE] > 除非您實作自己的更新功能，您必須設定自動更新功能運作的屬性。Unless you implement your own updating functionality, you must set the property for the automatic updating feature to work. 您可以控制資料的外觀資料列時控制項處於編輯模式下使用屬性。You can control the appearance of the data rows when the control is in edit mode by using the property. 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. 控制項提供數個事件，可用來更新記錄時執行自訂動作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a record is updated. 下表列出可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||發生於按一下的 [更新] 按鈕，但之後控制更新的記錄。Occurs when the Update button is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 若要檢查更新作業的結果通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||發生於按一下的 [更新] 按鈕前,控制更新的記錄。Occurs when the Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常用來取消更新作業。This event is often used to cancel the update operation.| ||之後，就會發生控制項變更模式。Occurs after the control changes modes.| ||發生於之前控制項變更模式。Occurs before the control changes modes. 此事件通常用來取消模式變更。This event is often used to cancel the mode change.| 值儲存檢視狀態中。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示內建控制項來編輯目前的記錄。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the built-in controls to edit the current record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewAutoGenerateEditButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateEditButton/CS/detailsviewautogenerateeditbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewAutoGenerateEditButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateEditButton/VB/detailsviewautogenerateeditbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當支援插入的資料來源控制項繫結至控制項，控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動插入功能。When a data source control that supports inserting is bound to a control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic inserting functionality. > [!NOTE] > 資料來源控制項插入資料，其屬性必須設定搭配 insert 查詢陳述式。For a data source control to insert data, its property must be set with an insert query statement. 當屬性設定為`true`、與新的按鈕的資料列欄位會自動顯示在控制項。When the property is set to `true`, a row field with a New button is automatically displayed in the control. 按一下 [新增] 按鈕將在插入模式下的控制項。Clicking the New button puts that control in insert mode. 在插入模式下，每個繫結的欄位不是唯讀的控制項中顯示適當的輸入的控制項，例如控制欄位的資料類型。When in insert mode, each bound field in the control that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a control, for the field's data type. 這可讓使用者輸入新資料錄欄位的值。This allows the user to enter the field's value for the new record. 按一下時，[新增] 按鈕也會取代 [插入] 按鈕和 [取消] 按鈕。When clicked, the New button is also replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button. 按一下 [插入] 按鈕將新記錄插入資料來源中，並將控制權傳回所指定的模式屬性。Clicking the Insert button inserts the new record in the data source and returns the control to the mode specified by the property. 按一下取消 5d; 按鈕時，會放棄插入作業，並傳回控制項的預設模式。Clicking the Cancel button abandons the insert operation and returns the control to the default mode. > [!NOTE] > 若要以程式設計方式將一個資料列放在插入模式下，使用方法。To put a row in insert mode programmatically, use the method. 您可以控制的是在插入模式下使用的記錄外觀屬性。You can control the appearance of a record that is in insert mode by using the property. 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. 控制項提供數個事件，您可以使用新的記錄插入時執行自訂動作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a new record is inserted. 下表列出可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||發生於按一下的 [插入] 按鈕，但之後控制項才會插入記錄。Occurs when the Insert button is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用於檢查插入作業的結果。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||發生於按一下的 [插入] 按鈕前,控制項才會插入記錄。Occurs when the Insert button is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用來取消插入作業。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.| ||之後，就會發生控制項變更模式。Occurs after the control changes modes.| ||發生於之前控制項變更模式。Occurs before the control changes modes. 此事件通常用來取消模式變更。This event is often used to cancel the mode change.| 值儲存檢視狀態中。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示要插入新記錄中的內建控制項控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the built-in controls to insert a new record in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewAutoGenerateInsertButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateInsertButton/CS/detailsviewautogenerateinsertbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewAutoGenerateInsertButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateInsertButton/VB/detailsviewautogenerateinsertbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料來源中每個欄位的資料列欄位是否會自動產生並顯示於 控制項中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row fields for each field in the data source are automatically generated and displayed in a control.

value.span: 表示顯示資料來源中每個欄位的自動產生繫結資料列欄位，否則為 。

span.span: to display automatically generated bound row fields for each field in the data source; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個資料列控制項由資料列欄位。Each data row in the control is represented by a row field. 當屬性設定為`true`，每個欄位的資料來源中建立的自動產生的繫結資料列欄位。When the property is set to `true`, an automatically generated bound row field is created for each field in the data source. 每個欄位然後顯示資料列中為文字，每個欄位出現在資料來源中的順序。Each field is then displayed in a row as text, in the order in which each field appears in the data source. > [!NOTE] > 自動產生的繫結資料列欄位不會加入至集合。Automatically generated bound row fields are not added to the collection. 自動產生資料列提供快速簡便的方式來顯示記錄中的每個欄位。Automatically generating the rows provides a quick and easy way to display every field in the record. 不過，要使用的控制項的進階的功能，您必須明確宣告中包含的資料列欄位控制項。However, to make use of the control's advanced capabilities you must explicitly declare the row fields to include in the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > 明確宣告的資料列欄位可用於與自動產生的資料列欄位搭配使用。Explicitly declared row fields can be used in combination with automatically generated row fields. 同時使用時，明確宣告的資料列會首先呈現欄位，後面接著會自動產生的資料列欄位。When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields. 值儲存檢視狀態中。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用自動建立資料來源中的 繫結的資料列欄位，每個欄位的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to automatically create bound row fields for each field in the data source. remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁時 (藉由設定屬性`true`)，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在控制項。When paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽區列包含控制項，讓使用者巡覽至其他記錄，並可顯示頂端、 底部，或同時上方和底部的控制項。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用屬性以程式設計方式存取物件，表示內的底部頁面巡覽區列控制項。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the bottom pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性之後，才可被控制項建立內的底部頁面巡覽區列事件。The property is available only after the control creates the bottom pager row in the event. 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式管理下方的頁面巡覽區列，例如當加入自訂內容。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content. 修改後必須執行屬性控制項已呈現，否則控制項將會覆寫任何變更。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been rendered; otherwise, the control will overwrite any changes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取的底端頁面巡覽區列期間控制事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the bottom pager row of the control during the event. 兩個控制項會在自訂頁面巡覽區資料列中的再更新目前的頁碼與總頁數。Two controls within the custom pager row are then updated with the current page number and total number of pages. summary.span: 取得或設定儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。

value.span: 儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距數 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 在相同的資料行中的所有資料格控制項具有相同的寬度。All cells in the same column of a control have the same width. 填補數量會套用到最寬的資料格和資料行中的所有資料格會調整為該儲存格的寬度。The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column are adjusted to that cell width. 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格具有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height. 填補數量會套用到資料列中最高的儲存格和資料列中的所有資料格會調整為該儲存格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row are adjusted to that cell height. 個別儲存格大小不能指定。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. 若要調整儲存格之間的間距，請使用屬性。To adjust the spacing between cells, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的儲存格的內容和儲存格的框線之間的間距大小。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫控制項來建立使用指定的欄位屬性的自動產生的資料列欄位。The method is a helper method called by the control to create an automatically generated row field using the specified field properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否控制項處於編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。Use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 下表列出不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`|控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| 這個值通常自動設定時新增、 更新、 插入、 刪除或取消命令按鈕控制項。This value is normally set automatically by the control by when the New, Update, Insert, Delete, or Cancel command button is clicked. 您可以使用，以也以程式設計方式變更模式方法。You can also programmatically change the mode by using the method. 當控制項變更模式，則下表中的事件會引發。When the control changes modes, the events in the following table are raised. 這可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式，在事件發生時執行常式。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a routine when the event occurs. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||發生於變更的模式，在命令按鈕按一下控制項時，但模式變更之後。Occurs when a command button that changes the mode of the control is clicked, but after the mode changes.| ||發生於變更的模式，在命令按鈕按一下控制項時，但模式變更之前。Occurs when a command button that changes the mode of the control is clicked, but before the mode changes.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否控制項處於編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 如果使用者嘗試瀏覽至不同的資料錄 while控制項處於編輯模式，在分頁作業取消。If the user attempts to navigate to a different record while the control is in edit mode, the paging operation is canceled. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewCurrentMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCurrentMode/CS/detailsviewcurrentmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewCurrentMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCurrentMode/VB/detailsviewcurrentmodevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定代表資料來源的主索引鍵的欄位名稱的逗號分隔清單。Use the property to specify a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source. 當設定屬性，則控制項會自動建立物件，代表目前記錄的索引鍵欄位，並將其儲存在屬性。When the property is set, the control automatically creates a object that represents the key field or fields for the current record and stores it in the property. 當屬性也會設為`true`、控制會自動確定中指定的欄位屬性是唯讀狀態。When the property is also set to `true`, the control automatically ensures that the field or fields specified in the property are read-only. > [!NOTE] > 您必須設定屬性自動更新、 刪除和插入功能運作的控制項。You must set the property for the automatic updating, deleting, and inserting features of the control to work. 如果屬性的資料列欄位設定為`false`，資料列不會顯示在控制和資料列的資料不會反覆存取用戶端。If the property of a row field is set to `false`, the row is not displayed in the control and the data for the row does not make a round trip to the client. 如果您想要看不到構成來回行程的資料列資料，加入欄位名稱屬性。If you want the data for a row that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來識別資料來源的索引鍵欄位繫結至控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to identify the key field for the data source bound to the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否控制項的編輯或 insert 作業執行後返回編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。Use the property to specify whether the control returns to edit, insert, or read-only mode after an edit or insert operation is performed. 根據預設，傳回以唯讀模式的控制項; 不過，您可以保留控制中編輯，或插入模式下，此屬性設定為適當的值。By default, the control returns to read-only mode; however, you can keep the control in edit or insert mode by setting this property to the appropriate value. 下表列出不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`|控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定控制項應該仍會處於編輯模式之後已更新記錄。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the control should remain in edit mode after a record has been updated. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中的欄位標頭資料行的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of the field header column in a control. 這是包含資料值的欄位名稱的資料行。This is the column that contains the field names of the data values. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `FieldHeaderStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `FieldHeaderStyle-ForeColor`). 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FieldHeaderStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FieldHeaderStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定欄位標頭資料列的字型和樣式設定。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the font and style settings for the field header row. summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，表示 控制項中明確宣告的資料列欄位。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the explicitly declared row fields in a control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項中所有明確宣告的資料列欄位。

span.span: A that contains all explicitly declared row fields in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您明確宣告的資料列欄位控制項，這些資料列的欄位會儲存在屬性 （集合）。When you explicitly declare the row fields for a control, these row fields are stored in the property (collection). 集合也可讓您以程式設計方式管理明確宣告的資料列的集合。The collection also allows you to programmatically manage the collection of explicitly declared rows. > [!NOTE] > 明確宣告的資料列欄位可用於與自動產生的資料列欄位搭配使用。Explicitly declared row fields can be used in combination with automatically generated row fields. 同時使用時，明確宣告的資料列會首先呈現欄位，後面接著會自動產生的資料列欄位。When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields. 自動產生的資料列欄位不會加入至集合。Automatically generated row fields are not added to the collection. 不同的資料列欄位型別決定控制項中的資料列的行為。Different row field types determine the behavior of the rows in the control. 下表顯示不同的資料列可以在中使用的欄位類型集合。The following table shows the different row field types that can be used in the collection. |資料列欄位類型Row field type|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||以文字中顯示資料來源中欄位的值。Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| ||顯示命令按鈕在控制項。Displays a command button in the control. 這可讓您顯示具有自訂按鈕控制項，例如新增或移除按鈕的資料列。This allows you to display a row with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| ||顯示在核取方塊控制項。Displays a check box in the control. 這個資料列的欄位型別通常用於顯示具有布林值的欄位。This row field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||顯示內建命令按鈕來執行編輯、 插入或刪除作業控制項。Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in the control.| ||資料來源中的欄位的值顯示為超連結。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 這個資料列的欄位型別可讓您將第二個欄位繫結至超連結的 URL。This row field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||顯示在影像控制項。Displays an image in the control.| ||顯示使用者定義的內容中的資料列的控制項根據指定的範本。Displays user-defined content for a row in the control according to a specified template. 這個資料列的欄位型別可讓您建立自訂的資料列的欄位。This row field type allows you to create a custom row field.| 明確宣告的資料列欄位控制，第一組屬性`false`。To explicitly declare the row fields for a control, first set the property to `false`. 接下來，加入 開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。Next, add opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 最後，列出您想要包含在開頭和結尾之間的資料列欄位``標記。Finally, list the row fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `` tags. 資料列欄位會顯示在順序的資料列欄位會出現在控制項集合。The row fields are displayed in the control in the order that the row fields appear in the collection. 雖然您可以透過程式設計方式加入資料列欄位集合，會比較容易列出的資料列欄位以宣告方式在控制，然後使用每個資料列欄位来顯示或隱藏資料列欄位的屬性。Although you can programmatically add row fields to the collection, it is easier to list the row fields declaratively in the control and then use the property of each row field to show or hide the row field. 如果屬性的資料列欄位設定為`false`，資料列不會顯示在控制和資料列的資料不會反覆存取用戶端。If the property of a row field is set to `false`, the row is not displayed in the control and the data for the row does not make a round trip to the client. 如果您想要看不到構成來回行程的資料列資料，加入欄位名稱屬性。If you want the data for a row that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式，將資料列欄位加入集合控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add row fields to the collection of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewFields#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewFields/CS/DetailsViewFieldsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewFields#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewFields/VB/DetailsViewFieldsVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內的 [刪除] 按鈕時引發事件按一下控制項時，但之後刪除作業。The event is raised when a Delete button within the control is clicked, but after the delete operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查刪除作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理常式。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the delete operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷受影響的資料列和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件，以重新整理控制後控制項執行刪除作業。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to refresh a control after a control performs a delete operation. 如此一來，與控制項同步處理控制項。This keeps the control synchronized with the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 內的 [刪除] 按鈕時引發事件按一下控制項時，但刪除作業之前。The event is raised when a Delete button within the control is clicked, but before the delete operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消刪除作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理常式。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the delete operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷要刪除記錄的索引，並指出應該取消刪除作業。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要取消刪除作業，請設定屬性`true`。To cancel the delete operation, set the property to `true`. 您也可以使用操作和集合，如有必要之前的值會傳遞至資料來源。You can also manipulate the and collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用取消刪除作業，如果使用者嘗試刪除最後一個項目，從事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel the delete operation if the user attempts to delete the last item from the control. summary.span: 設定資料繫結控制項在載入控制項之前的初始化狀態。

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來控制資料繫結在頁面的生命週期內發生的時間。The method is used to control when data binding occurs within the life cycle of the page. 它會藉由設定資料繫結控制項的內部初始化的狀態。It does this by setting the internal initialized state of the data-bound control. 因為控制項的初始化狀態期間設定網頁的生命週期的階段呼叫控制項的資料屬性變更時，該階段之後，以表示控制項必須重新繫結至其資料的任何時間的事件處理常式之前呈現。Because the control's initialized state is set during the phase of the page's life cycle, the event handler is called any time a data property of the control is changed after that phase, to signal that the control must re-bind to its data before rendering. 方法會覆寫類別來設定屬性`true`在其中的 HTTP 要求是回傳，已啟用檢視狀態，但是資料繫結控制項具有尚未已繫結的情況下。The method is overridden by the class to set the property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound. 此案例中是常見的控制項例如和，其中控制項的可見性則會在執行階段變更。This scenario is common with controls such as and , where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the displayed record.

span.span: The zero-based index of the data item being displayed in a control from the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁功能時 (當屬性設定為`true`)，使用屬性來判斷目前所顯示的記錄的索引。When the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), use the property to determine the index of the currently displayed record. 您也可以使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式變更顯示的記錄。You can also use this property to programmatically change the displayed record. > [!NOTE] > 啟用分頁功能時，您也可以使用這個屬性來判斷顯示; 記錄的頁面數目不過，請注意這個屬性是以零為起始。When the paging feature is enabled, you can also use this property to determine the page number of the record displayed; however, be aware that this property is zero-based. 若要判斷資料來源中的項目總數，請使用屬性。To determine the total number of items in the data source, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時的頁面巡覽區按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 頁面 」) 控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項負責的分頁作業。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理常式。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 當您以程式設計方式設定時，不會引發這個事件屬性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 頁面巡覽區按鈕通常位於中的頁面巡覽區列控制項。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. 此事件通常用來同步處理用來控制控制項或設定行為分頁作業之後的控制項。This event is often used to synchronize a control with a control or to set the behavior of the control after a paging operation. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件，以傳回為唯讀模式，當使用者巡覽至另一筆記錄。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to return the to read-only mode when the user navigates to another record. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時的頁面巡覽區按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 頁面 」) 控制項內按一下時前,控制項負責的分頁作業。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理常式。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 當您以程式設計方式設定時，不會引發這個事件屬性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 頁面巡覽區按鈕通常位於中的頁面巡覽區列控制項。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷使用者所選頁面的索引，並指出應該取消的分頁作業。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled. 若要判斷使用者所選頁面的索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the property. 若要取消的分頁作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the paging operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用取消分頁作業的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel a paging operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的設定中的頁面巡覽區列控制項。Use the property to control the settings of the pager row in a control. 頁面巡覽列會顯示啟用分頁功能時 (藉由設定屬性`true`) 並包含可讓使用者瀏覽至不同的記錄控制項中的控制項。The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the property to `true`) and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different records in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `PagerSetting-Mode`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `PagerSetting-Mode`). 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PagerSetting.Mode`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerSetting.Mode`). 頁面巡覽區列的顯示模式和自訂文字或影像的導覽控制項，通常包含一般設定。Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的頁面巡覽區列的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the properties of the pager row. summary.span: 取得 物件，其表示 控制項中的頂端頁面巡覽列。

value.span: ，表示 控制項上方的頁面巡覽列。

span.span: A that represents the top pager row in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁時 (藉由設定屬性`true`)，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在控制項。When paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽區列包含控制項，讓使用者巡覽至其他記錄，並可顯示頂端、 底部，或同時上方和底部的控制項。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用屬性以程式設計方式存取物件，代表在最上層頁面巡覽列控制項。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the top pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性之後，才可被控制項建立內的底部頁面巡覽區列事件。The property is available only after the control creates the bottom pager row in the event. 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式操作最上層頁面巡覽列，例如當加入自訂內容。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content. 修改後必須執行屬性控制項已呈現，否則控制項將會覆寫任何變更。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been rendered; otherwise, the control will overwrite any changes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取的最上層頁面巡覽區列期間控制事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the top pager row of the control during the event. 兩個控制項會在自訂頁面巡覽區資料列中的再更新目前的頁碼與總頁數。Two controls within the custom pager row are then updated with the current page number and total number of pages. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewTopPagerRow/CS/detailsviewtoppagerrowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewTopPagerRow/VB/detailsviewtoppagerrowvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).
